en.title: Gupshup raises $60M in equity and debt, leaves unicorn status hanging
en.summary: Gupshup secured $60M in equity and debt funding, four years after becoming a unicorn, but its current valuation remains undisclosed, leaving its unicorn status uncertain. (27 words)

en.title: PayPal taps wallets from China and India to make cross-border payments easier for 2 billion people
en.summary: PayPal is collaborating with fintech firms to enable seamless cross-border payments for 2 billion users by linking digital wallets from China, India, and other regions, simplifying international transactions. (49 words)

en.title: Amazon acquires Bee, the AI wearable that records everything you say
en.summary: Amazon bought AI wearables startup Bee, known for its bracelet and Apple Watch app that records daily conversations to serve as a personal AI assistant. (29 words)

en.title: OpenAI agreed to pay Oracle $30B a year for data center services
en.summary: OpenAI will pay Oracle $30B annually for data center services, confirming it as the unnamed customer in Oracle's recent deal disclosure. (20 words)

en.title: iOS 26 beta 4 arrives, with Liquid Glass tweaks and AI news summaries
en.summary: Apple released iOS 26 beta 4 for developers, introducing Liquid Glass refinements and AI-powered notification summaries. A public beta is likely coming soon. (49 words)
